channel.title: ElusionX
channel.description:
[size=36pt]We have now chosen what type of server we will be making: 508, this was as we want to do something different. Thank you [/size] Please remember and remind other people to: games=fun [b]Please give us a few minutes of your time and read this:[/b] [IMG]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/8952/logotemplatelogo1a.jpg[/img] [b]Hello and welcome to ElusionX's Development Team request.[/b] For many years I had loved playing Runescape; then one day they changed it (We all know the story) Our beloved Runescape was turned upside down, but this did not stop me, I carried on playing hoping for the best every day. But soon I noticed that nothing was changing. I was getting more and more mature ever day, one of my friends one day brought to my mind RSPS, and since that December day i have been playing RSPS. But our beloved RSPS is also changing, every server I see nowadays are all the same. They all have the same boring skills, the same weapons, the same skills, the same quests. But I would like to do some thing better, something that would benefit us all, something that would bring the old Runescape back. I am here proposing to you my idea, what idea? Let me show you. For me Runescape is like a big bag, mixed in it are all do good stuff and all the not very good stuff. What I would like to do is chose all the good stuff, that we all like, and take them and add them to ElusionX. [b]By the good stuff I mean:[/b] [b]Quests:[/b] I would like to add all the quests on Runescape at the moment. People like these, people enjoy these. [b]Skills:[/b] Most people do not have anything against most skills in Runescape, this is the reason I have chosen to add all the skills, including: [ul][li]Summoning[/li] [li]Hunter[/li] [li]Construction[/li] [li]Dungeneering[/li][/ul] The skills will also be a bit longer then other RSPS'; however they will not be as long as Runescape. [b]Minigames:[/b] All the minigames are fun for most people, I would like to fully add all minigames. These will include: [ul][li]Castle War[/li] [li]Soul war[/li] [li]62 wave JAD[/li][/ul] [b]Client:[/b] I did a survey among some friends a while back. I asked why do you still play Runescape. Out of 20 people, 12 of them stated that it was because of the quality. I would like to match this quality by doing this: [ul][li]Full screen mode[/li] [li]Hd Graphics[/li] [li]Hd models[/li][/ul] [b]Bosses:[/b] One thing I have noticed is that Runescape gamers love to challenge themselves with bosses. I would like to add all of these bosses. My friends, to achieve this we would need to work hard. But however hard we work we can not accomplish this alone, or even with 5 coders, we need the whole of the RSPS community to give Jagex a run for their money. This is the true reason why i am here, not to make any other normal server, but to make a change. I have organized this server like this: [b]There will be 6 groups, each one will have a group leader. Please Look:[/b] [b]Quests group:[/b] These will add all the quests. Available place: 1/5 [b]skills group:[/b] This group will work on skills. Available place: 0/5 [b]Minigame group:[/b] This group will work on Minigames. Available place: 2/5 [b]Client group:[/b] This group will work on the client. Available place: 0/5 [b]Bosses group:[/b] This group will work on Bosses. Available place: 0/5 [b]general coding group:[/b] This group will work on keeping the server dupe,bug and lagg free they will also do any random coding if needed. Available place: 1/5 [b]Graphics group:[/b] This group will work on the website, webclient and some modeling. Available place: 0/3 [b]These are some other positions. Please Look:[/b] [b]Staff group[/b] This group will be staff on the server. Available place: 2/5 [b]Webclient maker:[/b] This user will make a webclient. Available place: 0/1 [b]Advertise group:[/b] This group will advertise the server. Available place: 4/100 [b]Hoster:[/b] This user will host the server. Available place: 0/1 [b]To apply for any of the above please fill this out:[/b]
What position are you after? Why are you interested in ElusionX? How old are you? Do you have any past experience? Do you have any proof of this experience? By stating 'yes' you agree to the fact that you will be loyal to the server and that you are not working for or own any other server. Please pm paymon your msn.
As this is a community RSPS; i would like you guys to choose what type of server you want. Please choose from the pole, also post what you think. If you support ElusionX please post one of these in your signature: [IMG]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/8952/logotemplatelogo1a.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i953.photobucket.com/albums/ae11/hareszylip/flashy.gif[/img] Good Luck guys

This user will host the server.
Available place: 0/1[/quote]

Why are you interested in ElusionX? It seems like a good server to Host and I can see already it will be a good server!
How old are you? I am cerently 15
Do you have any past experience? Yes I do
Do you have any proof of this experience? Nope if I new I would need to take a picture of me hosting i sure would
By stating ‘yes’ you agree to the fact that you will be loyal to the server and that you are not working for or own any other server. “yes”

Add my msn " ii-bandos-ii@hotmail.com " Thanx please pm me your hotmail also or post it on here

[/size][/font][/i][/b]

item.title: ElusionX
item.dc:creator: @paymon paymon
item.description:
@paymon wrote:

[quote=“Ungrateful, post:13, topic:368108”]What position are you after?
Staff/General Coding

Why are you interested in ElusionX?
Many people try to create a private server by them selves and get overwhelmed leaving rsps in the stone ages compared to other games communities. This looks like a good place to start the progression of quality ps’s, and I would like to be a part of it.

How old are you?
17

Do you have any past experience?
yes

Do you have any proof of this experience?
No, most of it is just me messing around I never completed a server enough to release it.

By stating ‘yes’ you agree to the fact that you will be loyal to the server and that you are not working for or own any other server
yes[/quote]

ACCEPTED

jal knight:

I think this is a cool idea. Good job, i hope it turns out ok.

Thank you, wouldn’t you like to join?

Read full topic
